casebody.data:
Burns v. The State. Submitted October 20, —Decided November 3, 1903. J. A. Dodgen and J. P. Brooke, for plaintiff in error. B. F. Simpson, solicitor-general, contra.

This case being for decision hy a full bench, and the six Justices being evenly divided in opinion, the judgment is affirmed hy operation of law.

Indictment for adultery and fornication. Before Judge Gober. Milton superior court. August 26, 1903.
